title: Exploring Implicit Rules in Managed Learning: Technology-Supported Focus Group-Based Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Process for in-service professionals to analyze tacit workplace rules using mobile devices, facilitating collective learning based on individual experiences

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the interaction between formal and tacit rules within an organization based on case studies
Learners can identify at least three tacit rules within a team using anonymous feedback from technology-supported focus groups
Learners can explain at least two personal judgment criteria in the rule-implementation process by applying structuration theory
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
